data.title: 如何在ALT Linux上安装DDE桌面环境

paragraphs.context: ALT Workstation: Operating system and application suite designed for workplace at both office and home.

answers.text: 为办公室和家庭工作场所设计的操作系统和应用套件。

paragraphs.context: ALT KWorkstation: Operating system with Plasma desktop and application suite designed for workplace at both office and home.

answers.text: 带有Plasma桌面的操作系统和应用套件，为办公室和家庭工作场所设计。

paragraphs.context: ALT Server: Operating system and services to bring up and control enterprise IT infrastructure.

answers.text: 用于建立和控制企业IT基础设施的操作系统和服务。

paragraphs.context: ALT Virtualization 11: Operating system for enterprise virtualization.

answers.text: 用于企业虚拟化的操作系统。

paragraphs.context: ALT Education: Operating system for all kinds of educational institutions from preschool to high school which provides integration of both students' and teacher's workplaces.

answers.text: 适用于从学前到高中的各类教育机构，提供学生和教师工作场所的整合。

paragraphs.context: Simply Linux: Operating system for everyone. Easy to use and lightweight, functional and secure.

answers.text: 面向所有人的操作系统，易于使用、轻量、功能丰富且安全。

paragraphs.context: Starter kits: Starter kits are freely distributable images based on the stable ALT repository and designed for experienced users and developers of derivative solutions.

answers.text: 基于稳定的ALT仓库的可自由分发镜像，为有经验的用户和衍生解决方案的开发者设计。

paragraphs.context: The regular image builds are intended to aid those interested in ALT Sisyphus and the current state of Linux desktop environments (at least as packaged there). These are not the fully fledged properly tailored distributions but rather targeted technology demos that can happen to be useful either (the release manager's current laptop is installed using one of those -- did I mention these are installable LiveCDs?).

answers.text: 旨在帮助对ALT Sisyphus和Linux桌面环境现状感兴趣的人，不是成熟的定制发行版，而是有针对性的技术演示，且是可安装的LiveCD。

paragraphs.context: Please note that regular images are built using the unstable development repository (think debian testing).

answers.text: 不稳定的开发仓库（类似debian testing）。

paragraphs.context: On May 22, 2024, the latest images were builded on i586, after which they were moved to the archive: https://nightly.altlinux.org/sisyphus/archive/ There are no plans to resume building i586 images on Sisyphus.

answers.text: 2024年5月22日，i586的最新镜像被构建后移至归档，没有在Sisyphus上恢复构建i586镜像的计划。

paragraphs.context: Please refer to aarch64 (nee ARMv8), mipsel (MIPS32) and riscv64 (RV64GC) specific pages for more information on running the images in QEMU and on corresponding hardware.

main Gnome: x86_64: iso , rootfs ; aarch64: iso, rootfs KDE: x86_64: iso , rootfs; aarch64: iso, rootfs LXQt: x86_64: iso, rootfs; aarch64: iso ,rootfs; riscv64: rootfs Xfce: x86_64: iso , rootfs; aarch64: iso,rootfs, riscv64: rootfs

qas.question: Regular镜像main类别包括哪些桌面环境和架构？

paragraphs.context: auxiliary Cinnamon: x86_64, aarch64 Enlightenment[1] : x86_64 IceWM: x86_64 MATE: x86_64; aarch64: iso; riscv64: rootfs
experimental GNUstep: x86_64
non-desktop rescue: x86_64 , aarch64 jeos[2] : x86_64: iso, img; aarch64: iso,rootfs; riscv64: rootfs
The images are autobuilt weekly (on Wednesdays, Moscow time) but we can release updated ones manually as often as daily.

qas.question: Regular镜像的构建频率是怎样的？

answers.text: 每周自动构建（莫斯科时间周三），但可以手动更新，频率可达每天。

paragraphs.context:
StarterkitsRegular
quarterlyweekly
stablecurrent
rescue, livecd, installer, server, vmrescue, livecd, jeos

answers.text: Starterkits为季度更新、稳定版本，包含rescue、livecd、installer、server、vm；Regular为每周更新、当前版本，包含rescue、livecd、jeos。

paragraphs.context:
正式版下载地址：https://getalt.org
Sisyphus 版下载地址：https://en.altlinux.org/Regular
Sisyphus 是由 ALT Linux 团队开发和维护免费和开源软件存储库，适合作为发行版 LiveCD 构建的基础。 Sisyphus 中的软件往往比较新但不保证稳定性。
Alt Worstation 10 暂时还不能使用 DDE，推荐使用 Sisyphus 版本尝鲜。

qas.question: 哪个ALT Linux版本不能使用DDE？

paragraphs.context:
ALT Linux 是一个使用 apt-get/rpm 进行包管理，首次安装推荐更新系统和仓库。
```bash
apt-get update
apt-get dist-upgrade
```
安装完整 DDE 组件：
```bash
apt-get install deepin-full
```
重启后可以选择进入 DDE
